channel.title: This Picture Makes My Handwriting on the Right Look Nicer Than It Is on edel grace altares

item.title: Tumblr Post:
item.description: Disclaimer: This is a cross post from my Tumblr blog, Study, Scattered Me!. As well, any products mentioned in this post are not in any way sponsored (unless stated) and my views on those products are my own. My super messy notes (right) vs the rewritten version (left). During a lecture, neat and legible notes are the last things on my mind. Okay, sometimes I zone out and look down at my paper and think, â€œWow, this looks horrible.
